mapper.select: SELECT id, memberId, coachId, avg(serviceScore) as serviceScore, avg(classScore) as classScore, avg(coachScore) as coachScore FROM class_grade WHERE coachId=#{coachId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class_grade(memberId, coachId, classId, serviceScore, classScore, coachScore, createDate) VALUES (0, #{coachId}, #{classId}, #{serviceScore}, #{classScore}, #{coachScore}, now())
